column5: SIEN just going to add Read their last earnings call they are doing well They are getting their expenses under control and will do well
SIEN ouch gonna hold my nose and add
SIEN at this stupid stock level this could be a margin call too

SIEN I couldnt resist to buy another 5K shares Even if you were a technical trader this is at bottom of the channel so it is meant to bounce at least 20 I am expecting much more obviously Manipulation is getting silly I am not sure why Sientra was chosen to be screwed with by algosHF trading but I see this as an opportunity If you have patience and nerves Some whale trader can move this up 20 to 40 by 1 click based on the market cap now
SIEN another new low When will management make a statement to stop the hemorrhage if not I only wish Nugent the same fate

SIEN This is why you always need cash reserves Buying more now at major sale prices
SIEN could Deerfield have gotten it so wrong Why buy 9 of the company if it was going BK
SIEN Wow this is nasty Is this really just panic selling
